description: Chief Minister Howard Quayle said the decision had been taken to protect "critical care services".
title: Coronavirus: Isle of Man cancels TT races amid virus outbreak
title_page: Coronavirus: Isle of Man cancels TT races amid virus outbreak - BBC News
maintext: Southern 100 Racing, organisers of pre and post TT races, said it was fully behind Mr Quayle's decision and added it will be in contact with all competitors who have entered the races regarding the refund of entry fees "in the next fortnight".
